title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab S6 Lite 4 GB RAM 64 GB ROM 10.4 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Oxford Grey)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet (Non-removable Battery Included), Travel Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, S Pen, S Pen Accessories
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Hall Sensor, RGB Light Sensor
product_specification.Bluetooth Profiles: A2DP, AVRCP, DI, HFP, HID, HOGP, HSP, MAP, OPP, PAN, PBAP
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, ANT+, Wi-Fi Direct, PC Sync (Smart Switch), 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: WUXGA+ LED Backlit TFT Touch Display
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: MP3, M4A, 3GA, AAC, OGG, OGA, WAV, WMA, AMR, AWB, FLAC, MID, MIDI, XMF, MXMF, IMY, RTTTL, RTX, OTA
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: MP4, M4V, 3GP, 3G2, WMV, ASF, AVI, FLV, MKV, WEBM
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.The Ideal Device for Everyone: Featuring a sleek and lightweight build, this powerful tablet from Samsung is sure to be your go-to companion for all computing needs, be it drawing, taking down notes, gaming, and more.
product_description.Stylish and Sleek Design: This sleek and lightweight Samsung tablet is encased in a seamless metal unibody, making it ideal to take along with you wherever you go.
product_description.S Pen: From drawing and sketching to editing photos and documents, the S Pen is here to offer you a seamless way to unleash your creativity and get your work done. It offers a natural grip, along with low latency and impressive pressure sensitivity, making it your go-to instrument. Moreover, the tablet's magnetic holder helps keep the S Pen in place when not in use.
product_description.Do More with the S Pen: If you’re attending a seminar or a lecture, it is important to take down notes. The S Pen not only helps you to take down important notes on this Samsung tablet but also lets you change the font color and more. This tablet also lets you create searchable tags so that it becomes easy to find the memo you're looking for. Not only that, but this tablet also lets you write directly on a PDF file (write on PDF option must be enabled).
product_description.Carry this Tablet with Style: You can purchase a Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite book cover (sold separately) so that you can safely carry this tablet wherever you go. This sleek book cover from Samsung snugly folds around the tablet and clings magnetically. This book cover also comes with a dedicated compartment to place the S Pen when not in use.
product_description.Stunning Display: Thanks to the large 26.31 cm (10.4) display, this tablet not only lets you browse, sketch, and take notes but also keeps you entertained. The clear display and dual speakers of this Samsung tablet offer a complete audio-visual delight, so you can binge-watch your favorite shows or watch your favorite movies whenever you like.
product_description.Powerful Performance: Whether you’re playing games, switching between applications, or browsing the Web, this tablet from Samsung ensures that you can enjoy a seamless computing experience. The fast LTE and Wi-Fi speeds let you stream videos and play online games without any lag. Also, you don’t have to keep searching for a power outlet wherever you go as this tablet comes with a massive 7040 mAh battery that lasts for long hours on a full charge. If you’ve got a lot of photos and videos to store, you can easily expand this tablet’s storage via a microSD card (up to 1 TB), thanks to the microSD slot.
product_description.Reliable Network: If you’re in a place that doesn’t have Wi-Fi, you can still browse the Web and stream videos on this tablet, thanks to the Auto Hotspot feature. All you have to do is, connect your compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphone to this tablet via Auto Hotspot and enjoy the benefits of the Internet. With this feature, you don’t even need to change any settings or add passwords.
product_description.Don\u2019t Miss Out on Any Notifications: You can sync a compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphone to the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite tablet so that you can get call or message notifications on the tablet as well. This ensures that even if your phone is away, you don’t miss out on any important call or notification. To enable this, all you need to do is tap the icon in the tablet’s Quick Panel.
product_description.Safety Features: This tablet keeps your private data protected and safe from malware and malicious attacks, thanks to the hardware-backed and multi-layered Samsung Knox platform.
product_description.Dark Mode: Extended screen time is bound to cause eye fatigue. Minimize eye strain while keeping yourself entertained by switching on the Dark Mode that’s offered by the One UI 2. Moreover, this mode will also help extend the tablet’s battery life.
product_description.Visibility Enhancements: Thanks to One UI 2, you can easily customize the color preference and high-contrast elements of this tablet, according to your viewing needs. Moreover, this tablet's keyboard is designed in such a way that it offers enhanced visibility and definition.
product_description.YouTube Premium Membership: When you purchase this tablet, you can enjoy a YouTube Premium membership for the first four months. Get ready to enjoy watching videos from your favorite YouTube channels without any ads disturbing you.

review: One of the best Tab in this price range, Display is also good, battery is also good. But the processor is ok in this price range. Lots of features are available, and you can do any work with the help of S Pen, S pen is also working vey fine. I love this tab.

In this budget, I honestly think that this tab has it all that a student requires.
Pros:-
1. A really huge battery which gives you a really long battery backup.
2. S pen, which works pretty well with variety of functions.
3. Premium look of the tab, Sleek design, matte colour body, and two powerful clear sound speakers on both sides of the tablet which give you premium sound experience.

Cons:-
1. Although the tab supports fast charging, they give you an ordinary charger. No turbo charger added in the pack, so you will have to buy one or it will charge slower.
2. No extra S pen nib in the pack, so if the nib of pen gets distorted, you will need to buy it from open market.
3. Display is not led (but still gives premium experience if you are not addicted to led) and there is no gorilla glass covering so you have to buy temper glass for screen guarding.

Design and finish is as expected from the pictures. Colour is same as shown and very appealing. Samsung has done a very sober work.
Performance wise its great and battery backup is too good but charging takes a bit longer coz of the massive 7k mah battery.
Screen is vibrant.

Cameras are average and good for video calling stuff.
It runs smoothly. Stylus works just fine.
You can go for Huwavei mediapad 5 lite at 10k lower price but its Chinese. Samsung hardware is more trusted than Huwavei.
Its the best at this price.
Best for students.
5/5

This tab is a great option if you are looking for a tab that suffices your online classes and study.
You can do almost all the essential things that is needed for smart studies nowadays.
Pros
1. Spen is a great option that will ease your writing experience especially for annotation and marking while reading epaper and book.
2. Samsung notes helps us to write, save, edit and delete your handwritten notes in a convenient way. (it's similar to writing on paper with pen).
Not only this, you can re organise the stuffs as per your requirement.
3. Write on pdf is a great feature to write, annotate or mark your ebook while reading. I use to write important notes and highlight fact during reading epaper.
4. Sketching and creativity is one of the best features for innovative children.
5. With latest android version 11,you can download almost all essential apps with 64 GB ROM and 4GB RAM.
6. The camera is okay for attending lecture and online classes.
7. Battery is also enough for a full day normal usage.
8. Dolby atoms is really effective while listening to music with wired /wireless headphones.
Cons
1. You will face a little bit glitch when overloaded with dozen of apps. So it's better to remove or uninstall unnecessary apps.
2. The tab has hanging problem even when most of the apps are not running in the background. But it automatically turn on after that.
3. You can't play games as it has heating issue with heavy work load.
4. Charging time is slow.( 3-4 hours full charge)
5. Charger isn't fast charger.
